item.description:
The MCC International Film Series presents a FREE Indie film one Friday each month. They have installed a new High Definition Projection System giving us a much improved film experience.

April 20 – "My Afternoons with Margueritte" (France) - In a small French town, a nearly illiterate man in his 50's, Germain, considered to be the village idiot by his friends takes a walk to the park one day and happens to sit beside Margueritte, a little old lady who is reading excerpts from her novel aloud. She's articulate, highly intelligent and frail. Germain is lured by Margueritte's passion for life and the magic of literature from which he has always felt excluded. As Margueritte broadens his mind via reading excerpts from her novel, Germain realizes that he is more of an intellectual than he has ever allowed himself to be. Gérard Depardieu stars.

French. 82 mins.

Admission: FREE and open to the public

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: FREE Movie: "My Afternoons with Margueritte"
